markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> command (mental);   **Trigger** You damage a creature with a _pacifying_ weapon;  **Effect** The damaged creature must succeed at a DC 20 Will save or be pacified. A pacified creature takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls on any attacks that aren't [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) for 1 minute, and the creature also experiences a clear psychic warning that they should stop dealing lethal damage.
name: command (mental)
